page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: Trains: There is no railway station in our area but the Cambridge to Ipswich line passes through. Much of it is single track and there are many level crossings including the gated crossing by the Woodditton signal box. Buses and Coaches: Now that there are good roads many people travel by coach. Express or chartered coaches usually travel along the Newmarket by-pass which just touches our area. Local buses and coaches which stop to pick up passengers go through the town and along the road over the Heath. There are 6 services using this route. Cars: For most people a car is essential either for getting to work or to the shops. Buses are few and far between.
